com.commercetools.sunrise.common.template.i18n.composite

Class CompositeI18nResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.sdk.models.Base
      • com.commercetools.sunrise.common.template.i18n.composite.CompositeI18nResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I18nResolver

    public final class CompositeI18nResolver
extends io.sphere.sdk.models.Base
implements I18nResolver
    Resolves the i18n messages by trying to resolve them with each given i18n resolver until one of them succeeds. This class allows to override i18n resolvers.

        Resolves i18n message identified by a bundle and a key for the first found given locale.

        Parameters:
        locales - the list of locales used to translate the message
        i18nIdentifier - identifier of the i18n message
        hashArgs - list of hash arguments
        Returns:
